Summary: Epic 1 — Connector Catalog + Universal Ingestion
Define connector “golden contract” (manifest, auth, rate limits, mapping, tests).
Build Ingest Wizard v1 (schema mapping, PII classification, DPIA checklist, redaction presets).
Implement baseline connectors: CSV/JSON upload, S3/GCS/Azure Blob, HTTP pull, RSS.
Implement streaming ingest: Kafka/Kinesis/AMQP consumer with idempotency + backpressure.
Add CTI feeds: STIX/TAXII + MISP push/pull (phase 1 minimal fields).
Add enrichers pipeline: language detect, NER extraction, hash/perceptual-hash, GeoIP.
Implement OCR/STT “extract only” engines behind policy gates (no biometric ID).
Build schema-drift detection + quarantine lane for poison/noisy feeds.
Add data license registry hooks at ingest (source, terms, retention class).
Create golden datasets + IO tests per connector (CI gating).
Instrument ingest telemetry (OTEL traces, lag metrics, error taxonomy).
Epic 2 — Canonical Model + Entity Resolution
Finalize v1 ontology (Person/Org/Asset/Account/Location/Event/Document/Indicator/Claim/Case).
Implement schema registry + versioned migrations (safe extension rules).
Build deterministic ER (exact keys, normalized fields, blocking).
Build probabilistic ER scorer with explainable features + thresholds.
Create human adjudication queue UI (merge/split, reason codes, undo).
Add conflict graphs (contradictions, alias collisions, disputed merges).
Implement bitemporal fields (observedAt/recordedAt + validFrom/validTo).
Add policy labels to entities/edges (sensitivity, purpose, legal basis, retention).
Build ER regression harness on golden fixtures + reproducibility (seeded).
Add “explain merge” API endpoint (features, scores, overrides, provenance).
Ship “identity hygiene” runbook (dedupe, decay stale IDs, alert on drift).
Epic 3 — Provenance + Claim Ledger (Chain-of-Custody)
Define provenance data model: source → assertion → transform chain + hashes.
Implement evidence registration API (documents, media, extractions, transforms).
Build Claim nodes + support/contradict edges (evidence-first).
Add immutable audit of claim creation/edits with reason-for-change prompts.
Implement disclosure manifest generator (hash tree, transform list, licenses).
Create external verifier utility (validate manifest + hashes).
Build redaction map system (field-level + document-level) with replay safety.
Add “citation anchors” so UI/AI can cite specific evidence snippets reliably.
Implement retention + legal hold integration (no silent purge; dual-control).
Add export blockers (license/TOS enforcement with human-readable reason).
Ship “provenance completeness” dashboard (missing chain alerts, coverage %).
Epic 4 — Graph Query + Analytics Foundation
Implement policy-aware query layer (ABAC filters enforced at query time).
Build link analysis primitives (expand/pivot/filter; saved views).
Add pathfinding suite (shortest, k-shortest, constrained by time/policy).
Community detection + centrality metrics (Louvain/Leiden + betweenness).
Pattern miner v1 (co-occurrence, burst/lull, rendezvous motifs).
Anomaly scoring v1 (degree spikes, temporal irregularities, egonet).
Build XAI panels for analytics outputs (why this node/path/community).
Implement geo-temporal constructs (trajectories, staypoints, geofencing).
Add map/timeline/graph tri-pane synchronization (time brushing).
Performance harness (p95 query targets, heavy jobs queued).
Publish “analytics cookbook” queries + reproducible examples in docs.
Epic 5 — Hypothesis Workbench + COA Planning
Implement competing hypotheses objects (CH/COI tables, evidence weights).
Evidence scoring UI with provenance links + confidence bands.
Bayes update helper (explicit priors, assumptions logged).
“Missing evidence” prompts (what would disconfirm? what’s absent?).
Dissent annex workflow (structured dissent, attribution, audit).
COA planner as DAG (tasks, deps, resources, risk/impact).
What-if simulation v1 (node removal, propagation, sensitivity sliders).
Pre-mortem templates + decision log capture for tabletop exercises.
Guardrails: block unsafe “operationalization” steps; keep it defensive/analytic.
Exportable brief format (hypotheses + evidence + dissent + residual unknowns).
Pilot runbook: “Rapid Attribution (CTI)” implemented end-to-end in workbench.
Epic 6 — AI Copilot (Auditable, Cited, Safe)
NL → Graph query generator with preview + sandbox execution.
RAG over case corpus with inline citations tied to evidence anchors.
Prompt injection defenses (sanitize retrieval, tool gating, allowlists).
“Schema-aware ETL assistant” for mapping suggestions + validation rules.
Hypothesis generator that proposes alternatives + counter-arguments (not conclusions).
Narrative builder that drafts briefs only from graph snapshots + cited evidence.
Model cards + config capture (temperature bounds, versions, replay logs).
Policy reasoner: clear denial messages + appeal path.
PII/redaction awareness in retrieval + generation (no leaking hidden fields).
Evaluation suite (citation accuracy, hallucination rate, safety regressions).
“Explain this answer” UX (show sources, paths, transforms, confidence).
Epic 7 — Case Workflow + Collaboration + Reporting
Case spaces (roles, tasks, watchlists, SLA timers, checklists).
4-eyes controls for high-risk steps (exports, policy overrides, deletions).
Commenting/@mentions with immutable audit + legal hold integration.
Report Studio (timeline/map/graph exhibits; captions; caveats enforced).
One-click PDF/HTML export with redaction + provenance manifests attached.
Disclosure packager (bundle evidence, hashes, licenses, chain-of-custody).
“Reason for access” prompts for sensitive objects (configurable).
Saved views + pinboards + annotations (share within compartment).
Cross-case deconfliction (hash-matched identifiers, privacy-preserving).
Admin/ombudsman review queue for flagged actions/misuse.
Documentation + training “happy path” for analysts (synthetic demo dataset).
Epic 8 — Security, Governance, Privacy, Audit
Implement ABAC/RBAC baseline + OPA policy engine integration.
Multi-tenant isolation hardening (data, compute, cache, logs).
SSO (OIDC), SCIM provisioning, step-up auth (WebAuthn/FIDO2).
Comprehensive audit (who/what/when/why), query logging, tamper alarms.
Policy simulation (“what would this change have allowed historically?”).
Warrant/authority binding at query time (legal basis required for certain queries).
Minimization at ingest + k-anonymity/redaction tools.
Key management: per-tenant envelope encryption; field-level crypto where needed.
Misuse detection rules (overbroad access, unusual exports, prompt-abuse).
Secure SDLC gates: SBOM, dependency scans, secrets scanning, threat modeling.
Abuse-case test suite + quarterly red-team plan (tracked to closure).
Epic 9 — Reliability, Observability, Deployment, Cost Controls
OTEL tracing end-to-end (ingest → graph → AI → UI) with correlation IDs.
Prometheus metrics + SLO dashboards (latency, lag, errors, cost).
Query budgeter + slow-query killer + per-tenant rate limiting.
Job queue for heavy analytics (retries, DLQ, progress UI).
PITR backups + disaster recovery runbooks + routine restore tests.
Cross-region replication strategy (tiered by sensitivity/residency).
Offline/edge “expedition kit” v1 (signed sync logs; conflict UI).
Chaos drills (broker loss, pod kill, DB failover) with action items.
IaC standardization (Helm + Terraform modules; environment promotion).
Release train + canary deploy + auto-rollback with schema migration gates.
Operational readiness checklist (on-call, alerts tuned, runbooks, postmortems).
